faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What types of cabs do you offer?
faq.answer1: We offer a wide range of cabs including economy, standard, premium, and luxury vehicles. We also have options for SUVs and minivans for larger groups or those with extra luggage.
faq.question2: Are there any additional fees I should be aware of?
faq.answer2: The quoted fare includes all mandatory charges. However, additional fees may apply for extra services such as tolls, parking, waiting time, or special requests. These will be clearly indicated during the booking process.
faq.question3: Are your drivers professional and licensed?
faq.answer3: Yes, all our drivers are professionally trained, licensed, and background-checked to ensure your safety and comfort.
faq.question4: Is there a limit on the amount of luggage I can bring?
faq.answer4: The luggage limit depends on the type of cab you choose. Detailed luggage capacity information is provided during the booking process to help you select the right vehicle for your needs.
faq.question5: What is your policy on late cancellations or no-shows?
faq.answer5: For late cancellations or no-shows, a fee may be charged. The exact fee depends on the timing of the cancellation relative to the scheduled pick-up time. Please refer to our cancellation policy for more details.
faq.question6: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer6: We accept a variety of payment methods including major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, and online payment platforms like PhonePay, Google Pay, Paytm.

aboutUs.intro: We believe that every journey should be a pleasant and memorable experience. Established in 2024, our mission has been to provide safe, reliable, and comfortable transportation solutions for our valued customers. We understand the importance of punctuality, convenience, and professionalism, which is why we go above and beyond to exceed your expectations.
aboutUs.ourStoryText: Rido was founded by Mr. Satyam Krishna with a vision to revolutionize the transportation industry. With years of experience and a passion for customer service, Satyam Krishna set out to create a cab rental service that offers more than just a ride. From humble beginnings, we have grown into a trusted name in the industry, known for our dedication to quality and excellence.
aboutUs.ourFleetText: Our diverse fleet of vehicles caters to all your transportation needs. Whether you’re looking for a luxury sedan for a business trip, a spacious SUV for a family outing, or a convenient minivan for group travel, we have the perfect vehicle for you. Each vehicle is meticulously maintained to ensure a smooth and comfortable ride.
aboutUs.ourTeamText: Our team of professional drivers is the backbone of our service. Carefully selected for their experience, knowledge, and courteous demeanor, they are dedicated to providing you with a safe and enjoyable journey. Our support staff is always ready to assist you with any inquiries or special requests, ensuring a seamless experience from booking to drop-off.
aboutUs.ourCommitmentText: At Rido, we are committed to continuous improvement. We regularly seek feedback from our customers and use it to enhance our services. Our goal is to be your trusted transportation partner, delivering exceptional service every time you choose us.

ridoBusiness.title: Rido Business
ridoBusiness.intro: Rido Business: Tailored Transportation Solutions for Your Company
ridoBusiness.description: We are inviting vehicle owners to join our thriving community and unlock new opportunities for profit. By partnering with us, you can maximize the utilization of your vehicle, ensuring it generates consistent income while you focus on delivering excellent service. Our platform offers extensive support, flexible scheduling, and access to a broad customer base, making it easier than ever to grow your business. Join Rido today and take advantage of our innovative technology and dedicated support to boost your earnings and expand your reach.

cancellationRefundPolicy.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellationRefundPolicy.introduction: RIDO SP SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED believes in helping its customers as far as possible and has therefore adopted a liberal cancellation policy. Under this policy:
cancellationRefundPolicy.cancellationDetails1: Cancellations will be considered only if the request is made within 2 days of placing the order. However, the cancellation request may not be entertained if the orders have been communicated to the vendors/merchants and they have initiated the process of shipping them.
cancellationRefundPolicy.cancellationDetails2: RIDO SP SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED does not accept cancellation requests for perishable items like flowers, eatables, etc. However, refund/replacement can be made if the customer establishes that the quality of the product delivered is not good.
cancellationRefundPolicy.damagedDefectiveDetails: In case of receipt of damaged or defective items, please report the same to our Customer Service team. The request will, however, be entertained once the merchant has checked and determined the same at their own end. This should be reported within 2 days of receipt of the products.
cancellationRefundPolicy.productExpectationsDetails: In case you feel that the product received is not as shown on the site or as per your expectations, you must bring it to the notice of our customer service within 2 days of receiving the product. The Customer Service Team after looking into your complaint will take an appropriate decision.
cancellationRefundPolicy.warrantyDetails: In case of complaints regarding products that come with a warranty from manufacturers, please refer the issue to them.
cancellationRefundPolicy.refundProcessingDetails: In case of any refunds approved by RIDO SP SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED, it will take 6-8 days for the refund to be processed to the end customer.

ridoDriver.title: Rido Driver
ridoDriver.intro: At Rido, we are dedicated to providing exceptional online cab booking services, and our drivers are at the heart of this mission. We invite professional drivers to join our expanding community and become part of a trusted brand that values excellence, safety, and customer satisfaction. By partnering with Rido, drivers can access new opportunities for growth, flexible working hours, and the potential to maximize their earnings.
ridoDriver.whyJoin: Why Join Rido as a Driver?

competitiveEarnings.title: 1. Competitive Earnings
competitiveEarnings.details1: Fair Compensation: Earn competitive rates for every ride you complete, ensuring that your hard work is rewarded appropriately.
competitiveEarnings.details2: Incentives and Bonuses: Take advantage of various incentives, bonuses, and peak-hour promotions designed to boost your income.

flexibleScheduling.title: 2. Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.details1: Work on Your Terms: Enjoy the flexibility to choose your own working hours, allowing you to balance work with personal commitments.
flexibleScheduling.details2: Full-Time or Part-Time: Whether you want to drive full-time or part-time, Rido offers options that suit your lifestyle.

advancedTechnology.title: 3. Advanced Technology
advancedTechnology.details1: User-Friendly App: Our intuitive driver app makes it easy to manage bookings, navigate routes, and communicate with passengers.
advancedTechnology.details2: Real-Time Support: Access 24/7 support to assist you with any issues or concerns while you're on the road.

extensiveCustomerBase.title: 4. Extensive Customer Base
extensiveCustomerBase.details1: High Demand: Benefit from a steady stream of ride requests, thanks to our large and loyal customer base.
extensiveCustomerBase.details2: Regular Riders: Build relationships with regular passengers who trust and prefer Rido’s reliable service.

safetyAndSecurity.title: 5. Safety and Security
safetyAndSecurity.details1: Safety Features: Enjoy peace of mind with our robust safety features, including in-app emergency assistance and real-time GPS tracking.
safetyAndSecurity.details2: Verified Passengers: Our rigorous passenger verification process ensures a safe environment for both drivers and riders.

communityAndSupport.title: 6. Community and Support
communityAndSupport.details1: Driver Community: Join a supportive network of fellow Rido drivers who share tips, experiences, and advice.
communityAndSupport.details2: Continuous Improvement: Benefit from ongoing training and development programs designed to enhance your skills and service quality.

ridoParcel.title: Rido Parcel
ridoParcel.intro1: Rido Parcel offers cab owners a seamless way to diversify their services and boost their income. Our platform is designed to facilitate easy integration, allowing you to manage both passenger bookings and parcel deliveries efficiently. By partnering with RidoParcel, you gain access to a vast network of customers who rely on timely and reliable parcel delivery services. This dual functionality ensures that your vehicle is always in demand, providing a steady flow of business opportunities throughout the day.
ridoParcel.intro2: Joining Rido Parcel means you are part of a trusted and innovative brand committed to excellence and customer satisfaction. We offer comprehensive support, from easy onboarding to ongoing assistance, ensuring you have all the tools and resources needed to succeed. Our user-friendly app makes managing deliveries straightforward, with features like real-time tracking, route optimization, and secure payment processing.

privacyPolicy.cookiesIntro1: A cookie is a small file which asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added, and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site. Cookies allow web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, likes, and dislikes by gathering and remembering information about your preferences.
privacyPolicy.cookiesIntro2: We use traffic log cookies to identify which pages are being used. This helps us analyze data about webpage traffic and improve our website in order to tailor it to customer needs. We only use this information for statistical analysis purposes and then the data is removed from the system.
privacyPolicy.cookiesIntro3: Overall, cookies help us provide you with a better website, by enabling us to monitor which pages you find useful and which you do not. A cookie in no way gives us access to your computer or any information about you, other than the data you choose to share with us.
privacyPolicy.cookiesIntro4: You can choose to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies if you prefer. This may prevent you from taking full advantage of the website.
privacyPolicy.controlIntro: You may choose to restrict the collection or use of your personal information in the following ways:
privacyPolicy.controlDirectMarketing: Whenever you are asked to fill in a form on the website, look for the box that you can click to indicate that you do not want the information to be used by anybody for direct marketing purposes.
privacyPolicy.controlChangeMind: If you have previously agreed to us using your personal information for direct marketing purposes, you may change your mind at any time by writing to or emailing us at ridospcabs@gmail.com.
privacyPolicy.controlNoSell: We will not sell, distribute, or lease your personal information to third parties unless we have your permission or are required by law to do so. We may use your personal information to send you promotional information about third parties which we think you may find interesting if you tell us that you wish this to happen.

ridoMoney.title: Rido Money
ridoMoney.ridoMoneyTitle: RidoMoney: Your Digital Wallet for All Transactions
ridoMoney.ridoMoneyDesc: RidoMoney is a secure and user-friendly digital wallet integrated into our platform, allowing you to manage all your financial transactions effortlessly. Whether you are a cab owner, driver, or a passenger, RidoMoney simplifies the process of handling payments, ensuring quick, cashless transactions. Here’s how RidoMoney can benefit you:
ridoMoney.instantPaymentsDesc: Receive payments for rides and parcel deliveries directly into your RidoMoney account, ensuring immediate access to your earnings.
ridoMoney.seamlessTransfersDesc: Easily transfer money from your RidoMoney account to your bank account or use it for various in-app purchases and services.
ridoMoney.secureTransactionsDesc: Our platform employs advanced security measures to protect your financial information and transactions.
ridoMoney.convenienceDesc: Manage your earnings and expenses in one place, making it easy to track your income and spending.
ridoMoney.ridoCoinDesc: RidoCoin is our exclusive digital currency, designed to reward our loyal users and encourage engagement with our platform. Earn RidoCoins through various activities and redeem them for exciting benefits:
ridoMoney.earnWhileYouDriveDesc: Cab owners and drivers can earn RidoCoins for completing rides and parcel deliveries, offering an additional incentive to provide excellent service.
ridoMoney.customerRewardsDesc: Passengers and parcel senders can earn RidoCoins for frequent use of our services, referrals, and participating in promotions.
ridoMoney.redeemForDiscountsDesc: Use your accumulated RidoCoins to enjoy discounts on rides, deliveries, and other Rido services, maximizing your savings.
ridoMoney.exclusiveOffersDesc: Access special deals and offers available only to RidoCoin holders, enhancing your overall experience with our platform.
ridoMoney.whyChooseDesc: By incorporating RidoMoney and RidoCoin into your daily transactions, you can enjoy a more efficient, rewarding, and secure experience. These financial services are designed to foster a sense of community and loyalty, ensuring that every interaction with Rido is beneficial and satisfying.
